mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHALLENGE(CHALLENGESEQ, CATEGORY, CHALLENGETITLE, CHALLENGETEXT,CHALLENGESTART, CHALLENGEEND,CHALLENGEPERIOD, IDENTIFYFREQUENCY, IDENTIFYDAY, IDENTIFYTIME, CHALLENGEPHOTO, RATINGAVG, CHALLENGESTOP, CHALLENGEDEL, HEADERNUM, POINTCOUNT, EMAIL) VALUES(CHAL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{category}, #{challengetitle}, #{challengetext}, #{challengestart}, #{challengeend}, #{challengeperiod}, #{identifyfrequency}, #{identifyday}, #{identifytime}, #{challengephoto}, 0, 0, 0, #{headernum}, #{pointcount}, #{email})
